price: 13. Waxaa looga warrami Aadmiga Maalintaas wuxuu hormarsaday iyo wuxuu dib marsaday.
arabic: يُنَبَّؤُاْ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yunabba-u al-insānu yawma-idhin bimā qaddama wa-akhara
